queries.name: arithmetic (multiply) where(null)
queries.query: select plain_long_0 * 1 as res0, plain_long_0 * 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 * 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 * plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 * plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 * plain_float_1 as res5 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 * 1 as res0, plain_long_0 * 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 * 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 * plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 * plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 * plain_float_1 as res5 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: arithmetic (divide) where(null)
queries.query: select plain_long_0 / 1 as res0, plain_long_0 / 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 / 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 / plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 / plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 / plain_float_1 as res5 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 / 1 as res0, plain_long_0 / 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 / 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 / plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 / plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 / plain_float_1 as res5 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: arithmetic (model) where(null)
queries.query: select plain_long_0 % 1 as res0, plain_long_0 % 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 % 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 % plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 % plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 % plain_float_1 as res5 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 % 1 as res0, plain_long_0 % 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 % 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 % plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 % plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 % plain_float_1 as res5 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: case when
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_long_1, case when plain_long_0 >= 5  then -1 else (plain_long_0 / plain_long_1) end as r from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_long_1, case when plain_long_0 >= 5  then -1 else (plain_long_0 / plain_long_1) end as r from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: rlike
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, plain_string_0 rlike '^str1' as rlikeOp from scdb.alice_tbl_1 where plain_string_0 rlike '^s';
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, plain_string_0 rlike '^str1' as rlikeOp from alice.tbl_1 where plain_string_0 rlike '^s';

queries.name: like
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, plain_string_0 like 'str1%' as rlikeOp from scdb.alice_tbl_1 where plain_string_0 like 's%';
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, plain_string_0 like 'str1%' as rlikeOp from alice.tbl_1 where plain_string_0 like 's%';

queries.name: lower upper
queries.query: select plain_string_0, lower(plain_string_0) as lw, upper(plain_string_0) as up from scdb.alice_tbl_1 where plain_string_0 is not null;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_string_0, lower(plain_string_0) as lw, upper(plain_string_0) as up from alice.tbl_1 where plain_string_0 is not null;

queries.name: coalesce
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, coalesce(plain_string_0, plain_long_0) as coal from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, coalesce(plain_string_0, plain_long_0) as coal from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: substring
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, substring(plain_string_0, 2, 8) as t from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_string_0, substring(plain_string_0, 2, 8) as t from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: least greatest
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_long_1, least(plain_long_0, plain_long_1) as smallest, greatest(plain_long_0, plain_long_1) as biggest from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_long_1, least(plain_long_0, plain_long_1) as smallest, greatest(plain_long_0, plain_long_1) as biggest from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: concat
queries.query: select concat(plain_string_0, plain_string_1) as concat_col from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select concat(plain_string_0, plain_string_1) as concat_col from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: length
queries.query: select length(plain_string_0) as len from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select length(plain_string_0) as len from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: replace
queries.query: select plain_string_0, replace(plain_string_0, 'string', 'str') as n from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_string_0, replace(plain_string_0, 'string', 'str') as n from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: sign ceil floor round, abs
queries.query: select plain_long_1, sign(plain_long_1) as si, abs(plain_long_1) as ab, ceil(plain_long_1) as c, ceiling(plain_long_1) as ce, round(plain_long_1) as r, floor(plain_long_1) as f from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_1, sign(plain_long_1) as si, abs(plain_long_1) as ab, ceil(plain_long_1) as c, ceiling(plain_long_1) as ce, round(plain_long_1) as r, floor(plain_long_1) as f from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: sin cos tan atan cot degrees
queries.query: select plain_long_1, degrees(plain_long_1) as de, sin(plain_long_1) as s, cos(plain_long_1) as c, tan(plain_long_1) as t, atan(plain_long_1) as at from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_1, degrees(plain_long_1) as de, sin(plain_long_1) as s, cos(plain_long_1) as c, tan(plain_long_1) as t, atan(plain_long_1) as at from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: exp pow math log log2 log10 ln
queries.query: select plain_long_0, log(2, plain_long_0) as l, log10(plain_long_0) as l10, log2(plain_long_0) as l2, ln(plain_long_0) as ln from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, log(2, plain_long_0) as l, log10(plain_long_0) as l10, log2(plain_long_0) as l2, ln(plain_long_0) as ln from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: radians sqrt truncate
queries.query: select plain_long_0, radians(plain_long_0) as ra, sqrt(plain_long_0) as sq,  truncate(plain_long_0, 1) as tr from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, radians(plain_long_0) as ra, sqrt(plain_long_0) as sq,  truncate(plain_long_0, 1) as tr from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: cast
queries.query: select plain_long_0, cast(plain_long_0 as char(32)) as chr, cast(plain_long_0 as decimal(11, 2)) as de, cast(plain_long_1 as signed) as sig from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, cast(plain_long_0 as char(32)) as chr, cast(plain_long_0 as decimal(11, 2)) as de, cast(plain_long_1 as signed) as sig from alice.tbl_1;
